description.en:
Certain lovers are selected anonymously, only to find a strange symbol etched to their necks. Once those who are selected get too close to each other, or within the “Danger Zone,” one of them will die an explosive death. Suspicion, scheming, and murder… Once star crossed lovers, now enemies, willing to kill each other without hesitation…   
Ning Yuan, a young emotionless man, is suddenly thrust into this cruel game of death. How will he protect his “Soulmate?”

---
Lovers have been dying in the cruelest way possible. Victims were sliced up into pieces, as if their bodies had exploded. Andrea and Ian were mere bystanders to this spectacle until a misunderstanding throws them into “Killing My Love” (KML)!

This is a game that uses love to fuel murder. Each team of pairs are given targets that they must kill… or else. All the while, a sadistic gamemaster watches from the shadows.

KML is a game with no end in sight, but one thing’s for sure… this hell is just getting started.

---
**Official Translations:**
* English: [INKR](https://inkr.com/title/1404-killing-my-love), [Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/killing-my-love/info)
* [Korean / 한국어](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=59485481)
description.it:
Alcuni amanti vengono selezionati in modo anonimo, solo per trovare uno strano simbolo inciso sul loro collo. Una volta che i selezionati si avvicinano troppo l'uno all'altro, o all'interno della "Zona Pericolo", uno di loro morirà di una morte esplosiva. Sospetti, intrighi e omicidi... Un tempo amanti a stelle e strisce, ora nemici, disposti a uccidersi a vicenda senza esitazione... Ning Yuan, un giovane uomo senza emozioni, viene improvvisamente coinvolto in questo crudele gioco di morte. Come farà a proteggere la sua "Anima gemella"?

---
**Official Translations:**
* English: [INKR](https://inkr.com/title/1404-killing-my-love), [Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/killing-my-love/info)
* [Korean / 한국어](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=59485481)
description.zh:
匿名推举出来的恋人们，脖颈上突然浮现出一个诡异的炸弹符号，彼此间一旦越过了特定的“危险距离”，就会让其中一方物理性爆炸。猜忌、算计、谋杀……相爱的人们反目成仇，甚至拔刀相向……当天生情感缺失的青年宁远被卷入到这场规则残忍的游戏，又要如何保护“挚爱之人”？

---
**Official Translations:**
* English: [INKR](https://inkr.com/title/1404-killing-my-love), [Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/killing-my-love/info)
* [Korean / 한국어](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=59485481)
